metadata.name: PUA - Seatbelt Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of the PUA/Recon tool Seatbelt via PE information of command line parameters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\seatbelt.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('seatbelt.exe') AND lower(device.desc) = lower('seatbelt') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' dpapimasterkeys')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' interestingprocesses')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' interestingfiles')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' certificatethumbprints')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' chromiumbookmarks')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' chromiumhistory')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' chromiumpresence')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' cloudcredentials')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' credenum')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' credguard')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' firefoxhistory')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' processcreationevents'))) OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=misc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=remote')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=chromium')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=slack')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=system')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=user')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -group=all'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -outputfile='))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of the PUA/Recon tool Seatbelt via PE information of command line parameters
